summary: This is an email chain from November 30, 2021, regarding a request from Martin S. Bell for a transcript of a court opening. The request is made on behalf of a 'fan club' and references Bell's past work on a retrial with an unnamed individual and his partner, a former office colleague who is described as a mentor to that individual.

persons.name: Martin S. Bell
persons.role: Attorney at Simpson Thacher & Bartlett LLP
persons.context: He is the sender of the email requesting a transcript of a court opening on behalf of a 'fan club', referencing his past involvement in a retrial.

events.title: Court Opening
events.description: A court opening occurred, for which a transcript is being requested.

keyFacts: Martin S. Bell, an attorney at Simpson Thacher & Bartlett LLP, requested a transcript of a court opening from November 29, 2021.
The request is made on behalf of a 'fan club' and references Bell's past work on a retrial with an unnamed individual.
Bell mentions his partner and former office colleague is a mentor to the same unnamed individual and is also a 'massive fan'.
